api.name: getTopProtocols
api.description: Get the top DeFi protocols by Total Value Locked (TVL). Returns the top 20 protocols with their TVL, chain, category, and 1d/7d changes. Use this to show market leaders and TVL rankings.

api.name: getProtocolDetails
api.description: Get detailed information about a specific DeFi protocol including TVL breakdown by chain, description, links, and category. Use protocol slug like 'aave', 'uniswap', 'lido', 'makerdao'.

api.name: getChainsTVL
api.description: Get Total Value Locked (TVL) for all blockchain networks. Returns top 20 chains including Ethereum, BSC, Solana, Arbitrum, etc. with their TVL and native token.

api.name: getStablecoins
api.description: Get top stablecoins by market cap including USDT, USDC, DAI, etc. Shows circulating supply, peg type, mechanism, and supported chains.

api.name: getTopYields
api.description: Get the best yield farming opportunities across DeFi. Returns top pools by APY with project, symbol, chain, TVL, and whether it's a stablecoin pool. Optionally filter by chain.

meta.title: DeFiLlama
meta.description: DeFi analytics with TVL, yields, stablecoins across 3000+ protocols
